reviewText: A great off-beat, (WAY off-beat), bizzare movie, that is funny, but comedy seems to simplify it too much. If you are a fan of the Troma films you will probably dig this, (just don't expect the gore). I don't want to say too much to ruin it, but lets just say any movie that has Robert Downey as a judge, a sovereign state of one in the name of chess, and a leprechaun is a must see.
